summary: This is an email from August 12, 2019, regarding the issuance of memorandums to restrict an individual named Ms. Noel to the first floor and to notify Control of restrictions for both Ms. Noel and a Mr. Thomas. It appears to be an internal administrative instruction.

persons.name: Noel, Tova
persons.context: Ms. Noel is the subject of a memorandum restricting her to the first floor, and she is to receive and sign copies of the document.

persons.name: Thomas
persons.context: Mr. Thomas is also mentioned as being restricted, with a memorandum to be placed in Control notifying them of his restriction.

connections.description: Both individuals are subjects of memorandums notifying Control of their restrictions, as mentioned in the same administrative email.

events.title: Issuance of Restriction Memorandums
events.description: An email instructs the issuance of memorandums to restrict Ms. Noel to the first floor and to notify Control of restrictions for Ms. Noel and Mr. Thomas.

keyFacts: On August 12, 2019, an email was sent regarding the restriction of Ms. Tova Noel to the first floor.
Memorandums were to be issued to Ms. Noel for her to sign, with copies retained by her and returned.
Separate memorandums were to be signed and placed in Control to notify them of restrictions for both Ms. Noel and a Mr. Thomas.
